title: Bloomberg Markets: Microsoft Cloud Growth Marches On
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Microsoft Cloud Growth Marches On
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Anurag Rana Senior Analyst:Software & IT Services Bloomberg Intelligence Discussing Microsoft Corp.’s turnaround plan got back on track in the recent quarter, buoyed by rising sales of internet-based software and services.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
